LanguageData.SRV_GrillMealFine.label: grill fine meal
LanguageData.SRV_GrillMealFine.description: Prepares a fine grilled meal. Takes a while, but adds a good flavor.
LanguageData.SRV_GrillMealMeat.label: grill meat (1)
LanguageData.SRV_GrillMealMeat.description: Prepares a grilled meal consisting of meat. Takes a while, but adds a good flavor.
LanguageData.SRV_GrillMealMeatDouble.label: grill meat (2)
LanguageData.SRV_GrillMealMeatDouble.description: Prepares two grilled meals consisting of meat. Takes a while, but adds a good flavor.
LanguageData.SRV_GrillMealVeg.label: grill vegetarian (1)
LanguageData.SRV_GrillMealVeg.description: Prepares a grilled meal consisting of vegetables. Takes a while, but adds a good flavor.
LanguageData.SRV_GrillMealVegDouble.label: grill vegetarian (2)
LanguageData.SRV_GrillMealVegDouble.description: Prepares two grilled meals consisting of vegetables. Takes a while, but adds a good flavor.
LanguageData.SRV_PickleGeneric.label: pickle vegetables
LanguageData.SRV_PickleGeneric.description: Preserve vegetables or fruit in vinegar. Can be eaten by itself, or used in meals.
LanguageData.SRV_PrepSalad.label: prepare turnip salad
LanguageData.SRV_PrepSalad.description: Prepare a salad using turnip greens and vegetables.
LanguageData.SRV_PrepSaladCabbage.label: prepare cabbage salad
LanguageData.SRV_PrepSaladCabbage.description: Prepare a salad using shredded cabbage and vegetables.
